scripts.lint: export NODE_ENV=test eslint src test db
scripts.lint:fix: export NODE_ENV=test eslint --fix src test db
scripts.test:app: export NODE_ENV=test && npm run db:latest && node ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha
scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text npm run test:app
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=dev npm run db:latest && npm run db:initial-state && node src/app
scripts.start:watch: export NODE_ENV=dev npm run db:latest && npm run db:initial-state && nodemon src/app
